about_the_game:
Cooking Clash is a captivating VR restaurant simulation game where you manage your fast-food joint, delighting your customers with your unique culinary style. Utilize limitless ingredient combinations to satisfy customer demands.

🍔 Craft Customer-Approved Meals

In Cooking Clash, your culinary skills are put to the test as you create delectable dishes that satisfy the unique tastes of your diverse clientele. Use a vast array of ingredients to meet customer demands and watch as they leave generous tips in appreciation of your culinary expertise.

✨ Unleash Creative Masterpieces

Express your culinary creativity by designing dishes that are not just tasty but also visually stunning. Mix and match ingredients freely to craft innovative meals that amaze your guests and boost your restaurant's reputation.

🕵️‍♂️ Beware of Sneaky Customers

Stay vigilant in your bustling restaurant as some customers might attempt to steal unattended tips. Keep your eyes peeled and act swiftly to ensure all your hard-earned money stays secure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR on SteamVR with Index, Meta Quest 2/3/3S
  • Additional Notes: VR Only

short_description: Welcome to Cooking Clash, the VR restaurant game that lets you unleash your creativity! Run your fast-food spot, delighting both human and animal guests with your culinary flair. Utilize endless ingredient combinations to keep guests pleased and beware of cunning customers who might rob your tips!
